item.title: Bitflip for dummies
item.description: Since last week I’ve finally relocated to Gothenburg! Together with a class mate, I will write my master thesis on a consultant company called Knowit. The thesis will be about crypto in cloud services with focus on a swedish law called offentlighets- och sekretesslagen. I hope to get some more frequent updates on the blog in the coming months. But today I wanted to show a basic crypto attack, the bitflip attack on AES_CBC.
